      • lineWrapPixels

        public void lineWrapPixels(int value)
        Print Blank Lines.
        Parameters:
        value - Number of Blank Lines.
        The Height of Each Line is the Value Set by the SetLineWrapPixels() Function.

        Open Printer.

        Set Pixels for Blank Lines.
        Parameters:

      • setPrintFont

        public void setPrintFont(java.lang.String path)
        Set Print Font.
        Parameters:
        path - System File Path, Example : /system/fonts/DroidSansMono.ttf.

      • setPrintFontAssets

        public void setPrintFontAssets(java.lang.String path)
        Set Print Font.
        Parameters:
        path - Assets Resource File Directory. Font File Storage Directory : assets/fonts/Android-1.ttf.
        When Calling, Only the Name of the Font File Needs to be Passed as the Parameter : setPrintFontAssets("Android-1.ttf").

      • setPrintGray

        public void setPrintGray(int gray)
        Set Printing Grayscale Values, Default Value 1200.
        The Smaller the Value, the Lighter the Color.
        The Larger the Value, the Darker the Color.
        Parameters:
        gray - Grayscale Value. Value Range : [300, 5000].

      • setPrintRed

        public void setPrintRed(int red)

      • setPrintType

        public void setPrintType(java.lang.String type)
        Set Print Type.
        Parameters:
        type - 0 : Normal Print, 1 : Label Print.
